imdb.plot outline: Jeremy Lane is an ex security guard who finds his calling by torturing, physically and psychologically, abusers of children. He is pursued by Detective Colson, a hardened cop in special victims who has his own demons and Magdelena Dupont, a strong and passionate district attorney with a settle to score. Tales of morality, retribution and revenge.
imdb.title: The Level
plot: Jeremy Lane is an ex security guard who finds his calling by torturing, physically and psychologically, abusers of children.
